member.summary: Returns true the value is greater than 0.

member.returns: True the value is greater than 0, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.ToBool(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true the value is (Y, Yes, S, Sim, Si, Ja, Oui), otherwise false.
member.param: Value to be converted to boolean.
member.returns: True the string value is yes (or variations).

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.IsTrue(System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Safe checks if the value is not null and true.
member.returns: True if the value is not null and true.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.IsFalse(System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Safe checks if the value is not null and false.
member.returns: True if the value is not null and false.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.Describe(System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns yes or no based on the boolean value. The string values are optional (default yes, no) and can be replaced.
member.param: String to be returned in case of value is true.
String to be returned in case of value is false.
member.returns: Yes or no, based on the boolean value.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.Describe(System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns yes or no based on the boolean value. The string values are optional (default yes, no) and can be replaced.
member.param: String to be returned in case of value is true.
String to be returned in case of value is false.
String to be returned int case of the value is null
member.returns: Yes or no, based on the boolean value.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.IsAllTrue(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Checks if all values are true.
member.returns: True if all values are true, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.IsAnyTrue(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Checks if any value is true.
member.returns: True if any value is true, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.IsAllFalse(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Checks if all values are true.
member.returns: True if all values are true, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.BooleanUtils.IsAnyFalse(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Checks if any value is false.
member.returns: True if any value is false, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.CollectionUtils.IndexOf(System.Byte[],System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of its first occurrence in a one-dimensional array.
member.param: The item to locate in array.
The starting index of the search. 0 (zero) is valid in an empty array.
member.returns: The index of the first occurrence of value in array, if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1

member.name: T:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.DateTimeUtils
member.summary: Utility and extensions methods for DateTime types.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.DateTimeUtils.ToEpoch(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the Unix Epoch Time.
member.param: DateTime to be converted to Epoch Time.
member.returns: The Unix Epoch Time.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.DateTimeUtils.FromEpoch(System.Int64)
member.summary: Gets the DateTime from Unix Epoch Time.
member.returns: The DateTim from Epoch Time.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.DateTimeUtils.IsSameDay(System.DateTime,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Checks if two dates are on the same day ignoring time.
member.param: The right dateTime object. If null, DateTime.Now is used to compare.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.DateTimeUtils.Equals(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the value of this instance is equal to the value of the specified System.DateTime instance.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.DateTimeUtils.SubtractDays(System.DateTime,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a new System.DateTime that subtracts the specified number of days from the value of this instance.
member.param: A number of whole and fractional days. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
member.returns: An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of days represented by value.

members.member:
Returns a new System.DateTime that subtracts the specified number of hours from the value of this instance.
Parameters: value: A number of whole and fractional hours. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of hours represented by value.

Returns a new System.DateTime that subtracts the specified number of milliseconds from the value of this instance.
Parameters: value: A number of whole and fractional milliseconds. The value parameter can be negative or positive. Note that this value is rounded to the nearest integer.
An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of milliseconds represented by value.

Returns a new System.DateTime that subtracts the specified number of minutes from the value of this instance.
Parameters: value: A number of whole and fractional minutes. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of minutes represented by value.

Returns a new System.DateTime that subtracts the specified number of months from the value of this instance.
Parameters: value: A number of months. The months parameter can be negative or positive.
An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and months.

Returns a new System.DateTime that subtracts the specified number of seconds from the value of this instance.
Parameters: value: A number of whole and fractional seconds. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of seconds represented by value.

Returns a new System.DateTime that subtracts the specified number of years from the value of this instance.
Parameters: value: A number of years. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of years represented by value.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.ReflectionUtils.ExecuteForEachProperty(System.Object,System.Action{Nzr.ToolBox.Core.ReflectionUtils.Reflect},System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Iterate recursively on each property of given entity and invoke the action on each property found.
member.param: Action to be performed on each property. It receives an Reflect container with the entity, property info and property value.

A bit-mask comprised of one or more System.Reflection.BindingFlags that specify how the search is conducted. -or- Zero, to return null. (Optional, default BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic)

member.returns: IDictionary with entity name as key and properties names as value.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.StringUtils.Suffix(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Appends the suffix to the string if the string is not null. If the string is null the return will be a new string with the suffix.
member.param: Appends the suffix only if the string does not already ends with the suffix. (Default true)
One of the StringComparison values that specifies the rules for the search.(Default OrdinalIgnoreCase)
member.returns: A string with suffix.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.StringUtils.Prefix(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Appends the prefix to the string if the string is not null. If the string is null the return will be a new string with the prefix.
member.param: Appends the prefix only if the string does not already starts with the prefix. (Default true)
One of the StringComparison values that specifies the rules for the search.(Default OrdinalIgnoreCase)
member.returns: A string with prefix.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.StringUtils.IsEmpty(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a string is null or length == 0. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty("") returns true. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty(null) returns true. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty(" ") returns false.
member.returns: True if the string is null or has length == 0.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.StringUtils.IsNotEmpty(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a string is not null and length > 0. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty("") returns false. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty(null) returns false. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty(" ") returns true.
member.returns: True if the string is not null and length > 0.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.StringUtils.IsBlank(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a string is null or length (After trim) == 0. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty("") returns true. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty(null) returns true. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty(" ") returns true.
member.returns: True if the string is null or length (After trim) == 0

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.StringUtils.IsNotBlank(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a string is not null and length (After trim) > 0. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty("") returns false. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty(null) returns false. Invoking StringUtils.IsEmpty(" ") returns false.
member.returns: string is not null and length (After trim) > 0.

member.name: M:Nzr.ToolBox.Core.StringUtils.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the string value is null before call the Replace method. If the value is null, returns the default value (if provided).
member.param: The string to replace all occurrences of oldValue.
The default value returned in case the value is null.
member.returns: If the string is null the defaultValue is returned, otherwise a string that is equivalent to the current string except that all instances of oldValue are replaced with newValue. If oldValue is not found in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.
